short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatbot using the openai api to help the user perform several tasks using speech.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WaveBotAssist: Your Intelligent Conversational Assistant

WaveBotAssist is more than just a Chrome extension; it's your new intelligent conversational assistant powered by artificial intelligence, specifically ChatGPT, ready to enhance your browsing experience. Here's why you'll love installing it:

🚀 Maximum Productivity: Get instant answers to your questions, article summaries, YouTube video insights, and more with a simple button in your Chrome browser.

🗨️ Natural Dialogue: Conversing with WaveBotAssist is as easy as chatting with a friend. Ask questions and receive coherent and informative responses.

🖱️ Effortless Content Selection: Use your right mouse button to send website content to the assistant for instant summaries and relevant information.

🔊 Customizable Voice Synthesis: You have full control over your experience. Enable or disable voice synthesis according to your preferences, ensuring easy-to-understand sentence-by-sentence reading. Choose from multiple voices and languages.

🎙️ Voice Recognition: Utilize voice recognition to dictate messages and control the extension with your voice. It's convenient and efficient.

📦 Easy Export: Export responses as PDF or Word documents with a single click for offline use or simplified collaboration.

📧 Gmail Integration: Send responses via email through Gmail directly from the extension with ease.

📋 Copy and Paste: Easily copy responses to your clipboard for sharing wherever you desire.

🔐 Top-notch Security: Your data, including the OpenAI API key, is encrypted and secure, ensuring the confidentiality of your personal information.

WaveBotAssist is a free extension that can revolutionize how you interact with online content, thanks to its AI-driven ChatGPT technology. You'll need an OpenAI API key (free or paid) and microphone access authorization to fully enjoy its features.

Install WaveBotAssist now for a smarter, faster, and more interactive browsing experience!
